participant_abstract.sent: This is the summary of the the kick off meeting of the remote control project.
We discussed general ideas about the user needs and what can give us an advantage over our competitors.

The attendants were. a.. The project manager , email: participant1@ami b.. The industrial designer , email: participant2@ami c.. The user interface designer , email: participant3@ami d.. The marketing expert , email: participant4@ami.

participant_actions.sent: The ID is assigned the working design The ME is assigned the user requierements specifications and the UID is assigned the technical function design.
I will ask each of them to present the result of their work at next meeting.

participant_decisions.sent: 1 The remote control sould absolutly fit in the user s hand.
2 It would be good if it comes with a water proof box and a rubber protection.
3 It would also be a good feature if the remote control beeps when the user wisle while looking for it.
4 A desired feature is also for the remote control to be lighted.
5 It is also required to have as few buttons as possible.
6 It would be good if it can control several devices.

participant_problems.sent: UI designer worried about the cost of feature 3.
